div.a: Abbey Group Prices and Payment Policy

b.font: This is the OLD Burke Town School Website. This page is no longer being updated for the 2019-2020 school year.

div.b: Please refer to our new website at

font.i:
Like and follow us to get all
the up-to-date happenings at
Burke Town School!

b.font: Walk & Roll to School Day Tuesday, October 9, 2018

i.font:
"You have greatness inside you and
your job is to figure out what it is, dig
it out and give it to the world."

li.font: June 5, 7, 12 & 14: Outdoor Club Mountain Biking, 3:00-5:00 pm -
li.span: students need to be picked up at 5:00 pm at Vermont Children's Theater, Darling Hill Road.

li.font: June 5: 4th Grade to Shelburne Museum - Students leaving BTS at 6:30 am and returning at 5:30 pm.
June 9: OneBurke FREE Community BBQ - 5:00-7:00 pm at the West Burke Park.
June 10: Student Showcase Night and FREE Family Dinner.

FREE family dinner from 5:00-6:00 pm - As part of their Project for HOPE, the 8th grade Fighting Community Hunger group will prepare and host a free dinner consisting of a variety of pizzas and salads. Students will also showcase the work they have done this year to combat hunger in their community.
5:45pm-7:00pm: 6-8 Present (Students in the band will present 6:15-7:00)
June 11: 6th & 7th Grade Trip to Blue Man Group, Boston, MA. Leaving BTS @ 8:15 am and return at 9:30 pm.
June 12: BTS End of the Year BBQ (Sign Up Form)
li.span:
- On campus service students eat from 10:30-11:30 (Grades: 2, 3, 4 & select 8)
- Off campus service students eat from 11:30-12:30 (Grades: K, 1, 5, 6, 7 & select 8)

span.font: June 14: 8th Grade Trip to Funtown/Splashtown and Escape Room. Leaving BTS @ 7:00 am and return time 8:30 pm.
June 17: 8th Grade to the Mountain for Rehearsal. Leaving BTS @ 8:00 and returning by 12:30 pm.
June 17: 8th Grade Graduation - Burke Mountain Hotel @ 6:00 pm
June 18: 8th Grade Graduation Luncheon - Burke Mountain Hotel,
June 18: Panther Meeting @ 8:45 am - 8th Grade families invited.
June 19: Last Day of School - Early Release
June 19, 20 & 21: Professional Development Day for Teachers
July 1-5: Burke Middle School Humanities Camp
